page.title: 03Steeple Claydon's Population
page.content: The population of the area has grown to 1600 at the{1981 Census}and changed over the years.A questionnaire was distributed to every house in the village.Only 30% of the householders responded.The children have worked on these and the following facts have emerged: 1. 4 out of 5 of the population were not born in the village. 2. 60% of these have come to the village in the last 10 years. 3. 40% of these arrived in the last 5 years. The search for{employment}has brought families to Buckinghamshire and the desire to live in a village has brought them to Steeple Claydon.The comparative{cheapness}of housing in the area has helped the growth.A 3-bedroomed house would cost about #30,000 in July 1985.
